mock.missing_project_header: We need you to submit the project of the request
mock.missing_token_header: You need to authenticate using the token header
mock.missing_route: No route found with that endpoint and methods
mock.missing_response: No response available for that route and method
mock.invalid_json: JSON response has invalid structure, please fix response body

register.verify_email: Hi {name}, please verify your email address

login.verify_first: You need to verify your email address first

edit.user_edited: Your user info has been edited

email.verify_subject: Please validate your new Mockos email here
email.verify_message: You just requested an email change, the change will take effect if you click here {url}
email.verify_email: Please, verify this change in the inbox of the email you just sent us

resend_email.already_verified: No need to verify your account, you're already verified
resend_email.verify_email: We sent you a new email with a verification link

delete.project_deleted: The {project} project has been successfully deleted

edit.missing_file_body: You have to upload a file

sort.route_mismatch: The routes don't correspond to the correct project
sort.context_mismatch: You can only sort routes at the same depth
